landing.bio: I have studied c,c++,java,python,image Processing algorithms,graph theory,javascript,typescript,etc... I have a good experience in project making and have been part of several projects. I alse have a good experience in java and framework like spring boot.I had  worked with intellicus team of thinking machines as an intern on iot devices.

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for hangling iot device (Home Automation)

projects.title: SOCKET PROGRAMMING FRAMEWORK
projects.about: Framework to invoke the server side methods from client side without the need of writing networking code. Methods can be mapped with the help of annotations and called by their mappings from client side

projects.title: SMART HOME SYSTEM
projects.about: To control all the electronic appliances in a home, I developed this system that allows users to use a simple desktop application for switching on/off the appliances.

projects.title: DATA MODELER
projects.about: It is a web based tool that enhances productivity and simplifies data modeling tasks. Users can visually design the schema of the database without worrying about the required SQL. SQL script is generated automatically for the designed database

projects.title: Path Visualizer
projects.about: It is web base applicaton which is use to visualize algorithm amd maze.

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors and like to travel new places. Apart from this i like to dance and play musical instruments.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, i like to see movies and web series and play video games

awards.awardDetail: Golden badge at hacker rank in probleam solving
